meaningMnemonic: Once you remove the <radical>lantern</radical> from the <radical>tent</radical>, we will be ready for <kanji>departure</kanji>. We can’t leave the lantern inside of the tent; that’s a fire hazard. We’d best take it with us before the departure. Don’t you agree?
readingMnemonic: Oh! Don’t forget your <reading>hats</reading> (はつ) either. Wouldn’t want to start a <kanji>departure</kanji> without hats or a lantern. That’d be a short journey.
